weapons.name: Whisperfang Daggers (Dagger)
weapons.description: A pair of daggers forged with void-touched metal. When they strike true, they seem to steal the sound from their victim's throat.

weapons.name: Sunstone Blade (Sword)
weapons.description: A blade forged with a sunstone core. Once per scene, its wielder can command it to unleash a blinding flash of light, disorienting a foe.

weapons.name: Dragon's Tooth (Greatsword)
weapons.description: A colossal blade carved from the tooth of an ancient dragon. It resonates with Rya's power, dealing extra harm of her currently attuned element.

weapons.name: Piercing Gale (Spear)
weapons.description: A lightweight spear with a tip of enchanted, hardened air. It ignores 1 point of the target's armor.

weapons.name: Golem-Wrecker (Warhammer)
weapons.description: A hammer inscribed with runes of unmaking. It is brutally effective against constructs, dealing +2 harm to them.

weapons.name: Soulstring Bow (Longbow)
weapons.description: A bow strung with a strand of a wraith's essence. Its arrows seem to have a will of their own, guided by the wielder's intellect to seek their target's life force.

armor_and_shields.name: Mirage Mail (Medium Armor)
armor_and_shields.description: A suit of shimmering chainmail that bends the light around it. Once per scene, when you take harm, you can create a perfect illusory duplicate of yourself to confuse your enemies.

armor_and_shields.name: Aegis of the Stalwart (Heavy Shield)
armor_and_shields.description: A heavy shield that can absorb a single, devastating blow. Once per adventure, you can declare that an attack against you deals no harm.

robes_and_vestments.name: Flowing Robes of the Tide
robes_and_vestments.description: Robes that seem to be woven from living water. Once per scene, you can take a moment to focus and clear 1 Harm.

robes_and_vestments.name: Mantle of the Pack Leader
robes_and_vestments.description: The ceremonial cloak of a Frostfang alpha. When you give an inspiring command to your allies, you can use your Heart attribute to also give them +1 Armor for the next exchange.

accessories.name: Ring of the Earth-Warden
accessories.description: A thick iron ring that feels as heavy as a stone. It grants the wearer a +1 bonus to their Force attribute (max +3).

accessories.name: Pendant of the Red Sun
accessories.description: A warm, crimson stone that provides protection from extreme heat. You are resistant to fire damage, taking 1 less harm from fire sources.

accessories.name: Boots of the Unseen Path
accessories.description: Soft leather boots that are always silent, no matter the surface. When you Prowl, you leave no tracks, magical or otherwise.

consumables.name: Elixir of Might
consumables.description: A thick, crimson liquid that temporarily enhances physical power.
consumables.move: When you drink this, your muscles surge with power. For the rest of the scene, your attacks deal +1 harm.

consumables.name: Draught of Haste
consumables.description: A shimmering, silver liquid that seems to vibrate with energy.
consumables.move: When you drink this, you are filled with impossible speed. You may immediately take an extra action.

consumables.name: Ghost Pepper
consumables.description: A small, pale white pepper that is shockingly spicy. A favorite of the Brood of Dragnor.
consumables.move: When you eat this, your mouth is filled with magical fire. For the next few moments, you can breathe a short cone of flame that deals 1-harm (fire).

consumables.name: Stone-Skin Potion
consumables.description: A gritty, gray liquid that hardens the skin.
consumables.move: When you drink this, your skin takes on a stone-like quality. You gain +1 Armor for the rest of the scene.
